thread.title: Providers of Fixed-Income ETFs Aim to Make Them Easier to Use
thread.title_full: Providers of Fixed-Income ETFs Aim to Make Them Easier to Use - WSJ

author: Sarah Krouse
title: Providers of Fixed-Income ETFs Aim to Make Them Easier to Use
text:
Large exchange-traded fund providers are tinkering with the plumbing of fixed-income products, aiming to make the products easier to use.
ETFs, which track an index or other basket of assets and trade on an exchange like a stock, have been one of Wall Streetâ€™s fastest-growing products over the last decade. But funds offering exposure to bond markets are still dwarfed by stock-linked ETFs in terms of assets and number of funds.
